title: Hey i have a problem with resolution
body: Hey i have a problem with resolution and i cant set in game my good resolution.This week i bought a new monitor and my champions look so big soo ..i need to change that resolution.

replies.body:
It's possible that this is caused by the input file on the server saving some old settings. We should be able to resolve this by resetting that file that's saved server-side. The steps below will assist you in doing this:

*Log into League* then hop into your config folder, which should be in this directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these two files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted those files, jump into a custom match to confirm all your settings were set to default. You can then make any hotkey or Video changes you need to. Let me know if this resolved your issue!
